verbs.description: [ARG1: Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . )] [V: came] out [ARG2: against Gina Haspel , President Trump 's nominee to be CIA director] , [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-TMP: after her confirmation hearing in the Senate] .
Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) came out against Gina Haspel , President Trump 's nominee to [V: be] [ARG2: CIA director] , on Wednesday after her confirmation hearing in the Senate .
